ygData.msgSnippet: As the Decepticons and Predicons open up on the sweeps, the weapons bite through armor destroying many of them in a cecophony of explosions, the sounds

As the Decepticons and Predicons open up on the sweeps, the weapons bite th=
rough armor=A0destroying many of them=A0in a cecophony of explosions, the s=
ounds ripping across the open air light thunder. The autoguns from the base=
 peppered the skies, raking through the host dropping many from the skies! =
Even as the combined firepower of the=A0defenders raged across them the swe=
eps moved out into a slightly wider arc, seperating so as not to present su=
ch an easy target. With one accord thier own disintergrator cannons opened =
up, tearing into the earth below them as they targetted the base and the de=
fenders!
As Jhiaxus moved in to dogfight the sweeps, his weapons burning in=
to them, they quickly spin out of his way, thier movements quick and supple=
 as they manuvered. However as he moved forward he realized that it was not=
 the effectiveness of his weapons that gained him the advantage, but it was=
 the design of the sweeps! As they swung away from before him, they were cl=
osing in behind him, boxing him in, thier powerful canons firing. 
Just as =
the sweeps were fulling closing the trap on Jhiaxus, a few of those to his =
rear exploded and began falling from the skies as Myrmidon, now in starfigh=
ter mode caught up, his cannons cutting a swath of wreckage through the air=
. "I would not recommend seperating from the group." the 6-changer's voice =
cut through the channels. "There are so many of them, we could all be cut o=
ff. We need reinforcments!" 
Myrmidon banked to the left and up slightly as=
 the sweeps tried to box him in also, with thier numbers, it was possible i=
f they were not extremely careful!
(OOC: In addition to the defenders, the =
sweeps are definitely targetting the base, are thier weapons having any eff=
ect?)
Preston
(Da'minion)
